title: The Howler [ENG] (2013)
description:
The Howler

Is a beautiful game for iOS/Android/PC/Mac which can be played in a conventional click/touch manner or you can control everything by voice. The action of the game takes place in imaginary steampunk Vilnius, in 1905. The game is interlinked with the bestselling steampunk novel The HOUR OF THE WOLF by Andrius Tapinas. The English version of the book is set to come out summer 2013.
